question: What is the name of the start-up challenge launched by the Union Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology?
explanation:
The Union Minister of Electronics and Information Technology (IT) Ravi Shankar Prasad, launched a challenge named “CHUNAUTI” (Challenge Hunt Under NGIS for Advanced Uninhibited Technology Intervention).
The challenge encourages start-ups to develop solutions to address the problems being faced by the nation during the COVID 19 pandemic. The challenge has been launched under Next Generation Incubation Scheme (NGIS).
